name: rgb-color-mixer
description: A simple RGB color mixer application.

scripts.build: mkdir dist && xcopy src\* dist\ /E /I /Y && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const content = fs.readFileSync('dist/js/main.js', 'utf8').replace('window.OPENROUTER_API_KEY || \'YOUR_API_KEY_HERE\'', '\'' + process.env.OPENROUTER_API_KEY + '\''); fs.writeFileSync('dist/js/main.js', content);"
